TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 805
TEI.2.document_title: James W. Parker to Stephen F Austin, 06-29-1832

barker_notes.barker_summary: James W. Parker to Austin, June 29, 1832. Wants to settle 25 families from Arkansas. Some of them Baptists and would like freedom of worship. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 805

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*James W. Parker to Austin, June 29, 1832. Wants to settle 25 families from Arkansas. Some of them Baptists and would like freedom of worship. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="06-29-1832">June 29, 1832*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*See Calendar.*/p*
*/div1*
